boat.full_description:
Jolly has a wide bow and a work boat style, with a high freeboard, 13 planks per side, simulated clinker GRP hull. As well as her standing lugsail mainsail she has a furling jib attached to a bow sprit. Her design may be based on a ships’ boat or boarding boat. She has 2 thwarts, with 4 rowing positions, and built in buoyancy for and aft.
She was extensively refitted in 2016
boat.name: Jolly

ownerships.note: please check this is not a namesake

boat.short_description: Jolly is based on a work boat
